backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing chatrooms, messages, reactions, profiles, access control, and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing avatar-flow compatibility requirements and related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used as reference for build planning.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React application via /src/main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React app root with TanStack Router routes for lobby, chatroom, and admin pages plus shared layout with header/footer rules.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar selection dialog supporting local uploads and Giphy search with debounced requests and update-avatar mutation.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat area handling message lists, auto-scroll, replies, pinned video, and message sending logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Renders a chatroom preview card with media thumbnails, live status indicators, and optional Twitter/Twitch previews.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or URL input including Twitter embeds.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing because the app uses no authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with reactions, media embeds, replies, and optional voice playback.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Handles composing messages with text, images, video URLs, Twitter links, and optional voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Displays a pinned YouTube or Twitch video in a chatroom with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: React audio message player with waveform visualization, playback controls, timing updates, and synchronization across multiple audio elements.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Forces a one-time fresh chatroom refetch when the actor becomes ready and cleans legacy cache entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading identities, handling login/logout, and exposing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines chatroom, search, and message-related queries and mutations, including username/ID handling and transient state guards.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styling, theme variables, dark mode, mobile input tweaks, and custom styles for the voice message slider.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Defines frontend configuration constants for Giphy API usage.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into compact notation like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search Giphy and fetch trending GIFs, mapping API responses into simplified GIF objects with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements clientâ€‘side image compression with resizing, quality control, progress callbacks, and fallback to original on failure.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data to extract safe preview fields with caching and deduped requests.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, versioning, and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides utilities for extracting IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generating related thumbnail URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Renders the React app root with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page for authenticating with a password and managing chatrooms, including refetching and deleting via React Query.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a chatroom, handles loading and error states, and triggers view count increment when the chatroom loads.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows the chatroom lobby with search, category filters, and chatroom creation, selecting data from multiple queries based on user input.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending requests related to removing authorization checks for avatar uploads.
